title: All Hail The Power Of Jesus' Name
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c v5 c

v1: All hail the pow'r of Jesus' name!
v2: Ye chosen seed of Israel's race,
Hail Him who saves you by His grace,
v3: Sinners, whose love can ne'er forget
Go, spread your trophies at His feet,
v5: O that with yonder sacred throng
We at His feet my fall,
We at His feet may fall!
c1: And crown Him, crown Him, crown Him, crown Him,
And crown Him Lord of all.
